title: BA Trip Report Index - FlyerTalk Forums
text: Last edit by: Nimrod1965 This wiki and thread should only include trip reports where at least one BA operated flight or BA operated lounge is featured in the report. Please populate the wiki with trip reports posted this year, listed alphabetically by author. If you have more than one trip report to share, please list reports in date order of trip, starting with the latest at the top. Please include the author's name, title of report (as posted) and link to the report (on FlyerTalk). 2025 Nimrod1965 ORD-LHR FIRST Nimrod1965 LHR-ORD FIRST TPRUN LHR-BER CE TPRUN BER-LHR CE TPRUN First Class 777 LHR-BOS TPRUN First Class 777 BOS-LHR 2024 Trip Reports JapesUK BA Holidays 6 day tier point run JapesUK A.I. goes to Aberdeen JapesUK A trip to two continents - Istanbul JapesUK Back to Bucharest for a toothy treat JapesUK A Milan Day Trip T8191 Tottering to Crete T8191 More tottering by the old stick users TPRun Return flight from Corfu to LHR - Club Europe - May 2024 TPRun LHR to Prague - CE - Sept 2024 TPRun LHR - Munich - CE - Sept 2024 TPRun Munich - LHR - CE - Oct 2024 TPRun LHR-Delhi - Club World - Oct 2024 TPRun LHR to Istanbul - Club Europe - Nov 2024 TPRun LHR to Athens - Club Europe - Nov 2024 TPRun Athens to LHR - Club Europe - Nov 2024 TPRun DUB-LHR-JFK Nov 2024 TPRun JFK-LHR-DUB Dec 2024 2023 Trip Reports JapesUK A Christmas Escapade, Washington and my first first JapesUK A Stockholm Weekend JapesUK Brussels, no sprouts! F on A380 BA Trip Report Index #1 Original Poster Moderator: The British Airways Club, Iberia Club, Airport Lounges and Eco-conscious Travel Join Date: Jan 2003 Location: London, UK Posts: 22,556 BA Trip Report Index There has been an astonishing array of high quality reports to be found in the Trip Reports forum. Each report is an absolute treat to read and our BA travellers have been a very busy bunch this year. Here is list of reports posted from 2014 onward chronicling your BA travels: 2020 BA reports: Genius1’s A Postcard from Portugal via The Qantas London Lounge Genius1’s In the Footsteps of Film Stars: The InterContinental Carlton Cannes and the Riviera Schwann’s Flying after lockdown: LHR-AMS on the BA B787-8 in Euro Traveller! spymon’s Friday 13th Part 1: The Strike Before Christmas THEOBCMAN’s Club Europe (Club World) BA 787-8 LHR > ZRH T8191's https://www.flyertalk.com/forum/trip...-oh-there.html 2019 BA reports: gw76's Ba f lhr-iad Genius1's The British Airways A350 Club Suite Experience Genius1's In the Shadow of Concorde: The British Airways Premium Experience Revisited spymon’s Flying My First Inaugural - London to Ljubljana stu1985's A week in Cape Town - BA F to the Southern Hemisphere T8191's The Caribbean [again] with BA in Club World. T8191’s UK to Virginia again, BA in Business of course! T8191's Malta with BA (again) and a bit of inconvenience. 2018 BA reports: Carfield's British Airways's Lackluster London City JFK BA 1 April 2018 Genius1’s Views of Venice with British Airways golfmad's Above & Beyond, British Airways and Chase. A link to this thread will be added to the forum dashboard. Apologies to those whose reports I've missed. Please post any errors or omissions and indeed new reports to this thread and we'll add them to the index as we go. Last edited by Prospero; Aug 7, 2020 at 1:09 pm Reason: updated to 8 Aug 2020 #5 Join Date: May 2009 Location: London Programs: BAEC Posts: 3,031 #9 Original Poster Moderator: The British Airways Club, Iberia Club, Airport Lounges and Eco-conscious Travel Join Date: Jan 2003 Location: London, UK Posts: 22,556 For the avoidance of doubt, from now on all trip reports should be posted in the Trip Reports forum. Guys, you're going to have to get used to browsing the TP forum for your regular digest of travel reports. The post traffic of BA forum is off the charts, at circa 20,300 posts per month. That near on equal to the monthly post traffic of the AA, UA, and DL forums combined. It's not a big ask at all, now is it? Prospero Moderator: BA forum It's not a big ask at all, now is it? Prospero Moderator: BA forum #10 Join Date: Mar 2008 Location: North West, UK Programs: BA GfL (GGL/CCR), Hilton Diamond Posts: 2,022 My Helsinki TR is also still in the BAEC forum.
